column5: http://www.cbc.ca/strombo/technology-1/video-behold-the-frozen-floating-puck-of-science.html  Now if they could only make some boots that could levitate over the water
Just a matter of time.Wait for it
Darn youngsters and their fancy magic tricks
But the boots would have to be packed in dry ice. I think I would rather go bare foot threw the water then put dry ice boots on my feet.
